title: Eight Five Year Old Takes on Macmillan Gower Might Hike for Final Time
welcomeText:
# John Llewellyn

I am eighty five years old and have completed 23 previous Gower Macmillan walks.\
\
July 2024 will be my final Gower Peninsula Mighty Hike.

This year I will be walking with my son, Hywel, who is fifty years old. It's an opportunity to share this fantastic experience with my family, enjoying every moment.\
\
I started fundraising for Macmillan since my father was diagnosed with cancer and received support from Macmillan.\
\
In 2021, I was shortlisted in [South Wales Evening Post Community Award fundraising category](https://www.facebook.com/macmillan.cymruwales/photos/a.640296012680395/3915836351792995)

\
[You can follow me on Strava.](https://www.strava.com/athletes/58212778)

With your help, I want to raise as much as possible for people living with cancer.

Donating through JustGiving is simple, fast and totally secure. Your details are safe with JustGiving - they'll never sell them on or send unwanted emails. Once you donate, they'll send your money directly to the charity.
